byline.contributor: Ellen Barry contributed reporting from Mumbai.

abstract: Sri Lankan police arrest Basil Rajapaksa, former economic development minister and brother of former Pres Mahinda Rajapaksa, on charges of misappropriating public funds from program for poor.
lead_paragraph: Basil Rajapaksa, the country’s former economic development minister and a brother of former President Mahinda Rajapaksa, was arrested Wednesday.

headline.main: Former Sri Lankan Minister Is Charged With Misuse of Public Funds
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Sri Lanka: Ex-Official Is Arrested

snippet: Basil Rajapaksa, the country’s former economic development minister and a brother of former President Mahinda Rajapaksa, was arrested Wednesday.
